content:
I'd love to try some of these unique food experiences! The idea of visiting an izakaya and trying yakitori sounds like a lot of fun, and I've heard great things about tonkatsu too. And of course, I wouldn't miss the opportunity to try some delicious matcha treats.

But before we dive into the food scene, I just want to ask - are there any specific neighborhoods or areas that are known for their food? I'd love to explore some local markets or food streets to get a feel for the different types of cuisine available.
